channel.title: CVE Feed for Gitea -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Gitea -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-1010261|2024-08-05T03:07:18.495Z -- gitea -- gitea
item.description: Gitea 1.7.0 and earlier is affected by: Cross Site Scripting (XSS). The impact is: Attacker is able to have victim execute arbitrary JS in browser. The component is: go-get URL generation - PR to fix: https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/pull/5905. The attack vector is: victim must open a specifically crafted URL. The fixed version is: 1.7.1 and later.

item.title: CVE-2019-1010314|2024-08-05T03:07:18.527Z -- gitea -- gitea
item.description: Gitea 1.7.2, 1.7.3 is affected by: Cross Site Scripting (XSS). The impact is: execute JavaScript in victim's browser, when the vulnerable repo page is loaded. The component is: repository's description. The attack vector is: victim must navigate to public and affected repo page.
